alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chautauqua County through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Findley Lake, or 18 miles east of Erie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Westfield, Mayville, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Findley Lake, SUNY Fredonia, Chautauqua, Portland, Ripley, Stockton, Gerry, Brocton, Mina, Arkwright, French Creek, Sherman, and Cassadaga. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 59 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
